import React, { Component } from "react"; import Footer from'./Footer' import axios from 'axios' import ReactHtmlParser, { processNodes, convertNodeToElement, htmlparser2 } from 'react-html-parser'; class Product extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { productState:"" } } componentDidMount(){ const product = axios.create({ baseURL: "https://stag-new-api.contentstack.io/v3/content_types/product/entries/blt98e79e77e1db5ecb", // timeout: 1000, headers: { api_key: "blt74a459c57a383bbf", authtoken: "bltac1fe73d78f7ddab" } }); product.get() .then((data) => { console.log(data); this.setState({ productState: data }, () => { console.log(this.state.productState) }) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err); }) } render() { if(this.state.productState !== ""){ const productDescription=this.state.productState.data.entry.banner[0].description const rigthResources = this.state.productState.data.entry.right_sources.content const buildData=this.state.productState.data.entry.real_data.content const communicateData=this.state.productState.data.entry.process_communication.head_content const trySection=this.s return (

{this.state.productState.data.entry.right_sources.right_sources_content[0].title}

{this.state.productState.data.entry.process_communication.process_content[0].title}

{this.state.productState.data.entry.process_communication.process_content[0].description}
